lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump on Saturday accused former President Barack Obama of tapping his telephones during last year's election, lodging a startling allegation of abuse of power without evidence or explanation.
snippet: President Donald Trump on Saturday accused former President Barack Obama of tapping his telephones during last year's election, lodging a startling allegation of abuse of power without evidence or explanation....

headline.main: Trump, Offering No Evidence, Says Obama Tapped His Phones
headline.print_headline: With No Proof,Trump Claims Obama Tapped
